Danielle Smith
Data Recruitment Consultant
My client is a leading AI fraud detection, series B startup, that are using cutting edge technology to help fintech/financial services organizations, automate their manual reviews, reduce fraud losses, and increase their decision accuracy. They are seeking an experienced Director of Machine Learning to lead the development and implementation of machine learning solutions. The successful candidate will have a deep understanding of machine learning algorithms and techniques, as well as experience leading teams of machine learning engineers and data scientists. The Director of Machine Learning will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify business opportunities, develop machine learning models, and build scalable systems to deploy these models.Responsibilities:•Lead the development and implementation of machine learning solutions across the organization•Work with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for machine learning solutions that will drive business value•Develop machine learning models that can be deployed in production•Build scalable systems to deploy machine learning models in a reliable and efficient manner•Provide technical leadership and mentorship to a team of machine learning engineers and data scientists•Develop best practices for machine learning development and deployment, including model selection, feature engineering, and data preparation•Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in machine learning techniques and technologiesQualifications:•PhD or Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field•10+ years of experience in machine learning, data science, or related field•Demonstrated experience leading teams of machine learning engineers and data scientists•Expertise in machine learning algorithms and techniques, including deep learning, reinforcement learning, and natural language processing•Strong programming skills in Python•Experience building scalable systems for machine learning model deployment•Excellent communication skills and ability to work cross-functionallyIf you are a highly motivated and skilled machine learning professional looking for an exciting leadership opportunity, we encourage you to apply for this position. They offer a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits package, and a dynamic work environment where you can make a meaningful impact!Please apply below or email me directly at Danielle@tdacreative.com
